{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.21700v1", "title": "Normalized solutions of one-dimensional defocusing NLS equations with
  nonlinear point interactions", "summary": "We investigate normalized solutions for doubly nonlinear Schr\"odinger
equations on the real line with a defocusing standard nonlinearity and a
focusing nonlinear point interaction of $\delta$--type at the origin. We
provide a complete characterization of existence and uniqueness for normalized
solutions and for energy ground states for every value of the nonlinearity
powers. We show that the interplay between a defocusing standard and a focusing
point nonlinearity gives rise to new phenomena with respect to those observed
with single nonlinearities, standard combined nonlinearities, and combined
focusing standard and pointwise nonlinearities.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP,math-ph,math.MP", "published": "2025-03-27T17:04:43Z"}
